posts.post_content:
what's the lowest you would sell a graded (even if only "auth") tobacco card for? i have limited funds (less than $50) and would like to add a card or 2 (or 3 or..) to my meager little collection. i have several raw cards, but not a single slabbed T-card, so i'm kinda hoping someone here might make me a deal on something presentable? anyone?
pics would be helpful too.

--mike.

I think you would like the T210's.

Free Shipping & the prices below are for paypal (if you pay with money order you may deduct $2 off of each card).

1910 T210 Gehring SGC 1  $25.00 
1910 T210 Loos SGC A  $25.00 
1910 T210 Lovell SGC 1  $25.00 
1910 T210 Nimmo SGC 1  $25.00 
1910 T210 Tyderman SGC 1 $25.00 
1911 T201 Mecca Double Folders SGC 1.5  $35.00 
1912 T207 Recruit Charles Street PSA 2 $25.00 
T202 Hassan Triple Folder SGC 2  $35.00
